node.html: Worked as a teaching assistant for four different courses. Among them, I was head teaching assistant for the Machine Learning course.
Worked in the DELPHI research group at CMU on epidemiological forecasting using machine learning methods.

Spent three summer internships working for Bloomberg LP on different machine learning projects with financial derivatives. Spent summer 2018 in the London office, summer 2019 in the New York HQ and summer 2020 in the London office (working remotely from Frankfurt).
Worked in a team on developing cross-platform mobile applications.
